looks like something that should be changed

if you have avahi (aka zeroconf) installed, *.local
2008-11-12T00:34:00.000Z	jimv2000		addresses are resolved via mDNS first. The default config of avahi is to
2008-11-12T00:34:00.000Z	jimv2000		fail if mDNS is enabled and the host is not found in mDNS. This means
2008-11-12T00:34:00.000Z	jimv2000		that you cannot resolve addresses under .local which are
2008-11-12T00:34:00.000Z	jimv2000		in DNS but not mDNS.
